definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: kinsfolk (Ar. h.ay=a a group of families united by vital ties RS: K 36–40 Dr: Sm 119), pl. sf. [[חַיַּי]] 1Sa 18:18, incorrectly pointed with the interpretation my life RV, but rd. [[חַיִּי]] my kins-flok, We Ki Dr RS SS RVm VB. It is explained by the gloss [[משׁפחת אבי]] We (Klo rds. [[אַחַי וּ]]).
